solution_line_template: The difference in writing speed is {right_hand_wpm} words/minute - {left_hand_wpm} words/minute = <<{right_hand_wpm}-{left_hand_wpm}={speed_difference}>>{speed_difference} words/minute
Matt can write {speed_difference} words/minute x {minutes} minutes = <<{speed_difference}*{minutes}={more_words}>>{more_words} more words with his right hand.
